Package com.iLabs.spice.handler

Class Summary
AddFriendHandler This class handle all action related to adding a friend like send friend request, accept or deny friend request.
ApplicationHandler This class handle all action related application like add application, delete application,get all information regarding application and also handle delete and add user application.
EditProfileHandler This class handle all action related profile updation.
FriendProfileHandler This class handles all actions related to visit friends profile like populating friend profile details and friend's album.
ImageUploadHandler This class is used to handle functionality related to album like upload image,retrieve user album from services, process image for preview and delete image.
LoginHandler This class is used to handle functionality related to login like authenticate user,forgot password and logout.
MyFriendsHandler This class holds rendering information of my friends list.
OwnerProfileHandler  
RegisterHandler This class handle all action related registration of user
ScrapHandler This class is used to handle functionality related to scrap like post scrap, show scrap, count no of scraps and delete scrap.
SearchHandler This class handle all action related search user function.
SendMailHandler This class handles all actions related to mail functionality like sendMail, populating friend email ids and also provide rendering information of send mail button.
